Hi. I'm Joe.

I make things for the web, play music, and sometimes write about stuff.

About Me

I grew up in Wisconsin, moved to Washington, DC in 2013, and moved back to Madison, WI in 2015. These days I work as a software project manager.

In my free time, I make random web-related things. Like this site. Or a bot that tweets random things at celebrities.

I also make music. You can check out my band's site at doublesasafrisbee.com.

Say Hi

Want me to make a website for you? Maybe write you a song? Just want to say hi?

Send me an email at joseph.r.turk@gmail.com.
